sect1.para: Using NetBSD/prep as a base, NetBSD was ported to an MVME1603-051 by Steve Woodford. The board was one of two donated to the NetBSD Foundation by Gan Starling on the condition that a port be attempted.
Following receipt of the boards, and replacement of the VxWorks bootcode by a PPCBUG image kindly provided by Motorola Computer Group, NetBSD/mvmeppc was up and running multi-user within two weeks.
